price.description: The rate to apply to usage for this product in this tier. In the case of percentage pricing where `isPricePercentage` is set to `true`, a value of 1 represents 100%.

fee.description: The nominal fee associated with usage at this tier

interval.description: Interval determines the time period over which usage is aggregated. For example, if the frequency is MONTHLY and the interval is 3, the usage is aggregated over 3 months before starting at 0 again.
